statements: SELECT * FROM property_sales_data;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM property_sales_data;
SELECT sale_date, property_id FROM property_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_sales_data WHERE sale_price > 50000;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM property_sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_sales_data WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM property_sales_data WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT property_name, sale_date FROM property_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_sales_data WHERE sale_price BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY sale_price ASC;
SELECT AVG(sale_price) AS average_sale_price FROM property_sales_data;
SELECT * FROM property_sales WHERE property_id = 100;
SELECT sale_date, sale_price FROM property_sales WHERE neighborhood_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM property_sales WHERE sale_price > 500000;
SELECT AVG(sale_price) AS average_sale_price FROM property_sales WHERE sale_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT neighborhood_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM property_sales GROUP BY neighborhood_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_price ASC
SELECT property_id, sale_date, sale_price, property_type FROM property_sales JOIN rental_rates USING (property_id) WHERE neighborhood_id = 1
SELECT property_id, sale_date, sale_price, property_type FROM property_sales WHERE property_type = 'House' AND neighborhood_id = 3 ORDER BY sale_price DESC
SELECT property_id, rental_date, rental_rate, lease_duration FROM rental_rates WHERE rental_rate > 500 ORDER BY rental_rate DESC
SELECT property_id, sale_date, neighborhood_id FROM property_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND neighborhood_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM property_sales;
SELECT property_id, sale_price, sale_date FROM property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM property_sales WHERE neighborhood_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(sale_price) AS average_sale_price, property_type FROM property_sales GROUP BY property_type;
SELECT * FROM rental_rates WHERE rent_price > 1500 ORDER BY rent_price DESC, rent_date ASC;
SELECT property_id, sale_price, sale_date, property_type, neighborhood_id FROM property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, rent_price, rent_date, lease_duration, neighborhood_id FROM rental_rates WHERE lease_duration > 12;
SELECT property_id, sale_price, property_type, neighborhood_id FROM property_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_id, median_income, average_age, education_level FROM neighborhood_demographics WHERE population > 50000;
SELECT * FROM property_sales JOIN rental_rates USING (property_id) WHERE property_sales.sale_price > 150000 AND rental_rates.rent_price < 2000 ORDER BY sale_price, rent_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_sales;
SELECT property_name, sale_price, sale_date FROM property_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, average_income FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY average_income DESC;
SELECT id, property_id, rental_rate FROM rental_rates WHERE rental_rate < 1500 ORDER BY rental_rate ASC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_age, median_household_income FROM neighborhoods INNER JOIN demographics ON neighborhoods.id = demographics.neighborhood_id WHERE median_age < 40;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM property_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT neighborhoods.neighborhood_name, property_sales.property_name, rental_rates.rental_rate FROM neighborhoods LEFT JOIN property_sales ON neighborhoods.id = property_sales.neighborhood_id LEFT JOIN rental_rates ON property_sales.id = rental_rates.property_id;

SELECT property_sales.property_name, neighborhoods.neighborhood_name, demographics.median_age FROM demographics JOIN neighborhoods ON neighborhoods.id = demographics.neighborhood_id JOIN property_sales ON neighborhoods.id = property_sales.neighborhood_id WHERE demographics.ethnicity = 'Hispanic';

SELECT property_sales.property_name, rental_rates.rental_rate, neighborhoods.neighborhood_name FROM property_sales JOIN rental_rates ON property_sales.id = rental_rates.property_id JOIN neighborhoods ON neighborhoods.id = property_sales.neighborhood_id WHERE neighborhoods.population > 10000;

SELECT property_sales.property_name, rental_rates.rental_rate, demographics.median_age, neighborhoods.average_income FROM property_sales JOIN rental_rates ON property_sales.id = rental_rates.property_id JOIN demographics ON demographics.neighborhood_id = property_sales.neighborhood_id JOIN neighborhoods ON neighborhoods.id = property_sales.neighborhood_id WHERE rental_rates.rental_rate > 500 AND demographics.median_age < 40;
SELECT property_id, address, sale_price, date_sold FROM PropertySalesData ORDER BY sale_price DESC
SELECT address, rate FROM RentalRates WHERE date_updated >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT neighborhood_name, population, median_income FROM NeighborhoodDemographics WHERE population > 10000
SELECT trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE date_published = '2022-05-15'
SELECT opportunity_id, description, return_rate FROM InvestmentOpportunities WHERE is_active = TRUE
SELECT * FROM PropertySalesData ORDER BY date_sold DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM NeighborhoodDemographics WHERE median_income > 50000
SELECT address, rate FROM RentalRates WHERE rate < 200 ORDER BY rate ASC
SELECT trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE DATE(date_published) = '2022-01-01'
SELECT description, return_rate FROM InvestmentOpportunities WHERE is_active = TRUE
